title: Friggin' scarf... err, S-s-C-c-a-r-f
content: Just had to get this off my chest, but theses letters are \_such\_ a pain to design, especially Ss, and I'm never happy with the results. Does anybody else find this to be so, and do you have any advice?
author: jafo

comments.content:
A few months ago (?) John Hudson nicely outlined his useful method of making an "S". But some (light) searching didn't turn it up, sorry.

hhp
